mapper.select: select a.*, b.name as createByName, a.status, c.name as statusName, b.dept_id as deptId, d.name as deptName from cus_pay_apply a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_by=b.user_id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary c on a.status=c.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on b.dept_id=d.dept_id WHERE a.id=#{id}
